story_25_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: All right, listen! We’re through puttin’ up with you!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’re sick of your big, risky gambits and your
all-or-nothing battle style! We’re done bein’ on
your team!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You still wanna tackle the PML? Sure, have fun...
on your own!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You’ve got me wrong. All-or-nothing games
aren’t my style.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Every card in the deck has the potential to bring
home a win. All I do is show them the way.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’ve never withdrawn from any battles.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
But, well, what’s a player to do when they don’t
have a single card to play?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I think it’s about time I cut my losses.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: See what’s next out there for ol’ Grimsley...
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I sincerely hope you’re not thinking about
leaving Pasio.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: It’s far too soon for you to even consider that!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Are you really going to give up here? Let all that
power of yours go to waste?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
What business could a couple of Indigo Elite Four
members possibly have with me?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: I’ll cut to the chase, then.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Why don’t you join our team, Grimsley?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: Your battle style speaks to me.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
The way you relentlessly pursue victory, no matter
who your opponent is or what obstacles appear
in your path...
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
There aren’t many Trainers out there who have
your resolve.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Truly skilled Trainers should try to win with the
Pokémon they love best.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Once the battle actually begins, though, that can
be easier said than done.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
We’re on the cusp of qualifying for the finals.
But if we want to keep our winning streak once
we’re in, we’ll need you.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Who better than a thrill seeker to channel our
yearning for victory and swing the odds in
our favor?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: Please, Grimsley! Be our trump card!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
The winner takes everything, and there’s nothing
left for the loser.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
That’s been the philosophy guiding all my battles
up till now, and that’s not about to change.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
In the heat of the moment, I could choose to make
a move, believing it would win us the battle...
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
but the cost of that choice would be that your dear
partner Pokémon get hurt.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Are you sure you can stand here in front of your
partners and tell me that’s all right?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: I’m not going to answer that question.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: Or should I say, do I even need to answer?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Think of the ceaseless training and effort I put in
just so I could climb high enough to finally join the
Elite Four!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3800_10:
I traveled the world, training every waking hour
for days on end...
story_25_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
I didn’t do all that just to have you doubt the
unwavering strength I’ve gained from all
that experience!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
I won’t even let you get to the point where you
have to consider hurting my partner to win!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Didn’t I just say that truly skilled Trainers try their
hardest to win?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4300_10:
That’s because we want to win alongside the
Pokémon we love best, no matter what we have
to endure!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4400_10:
My partner and I are one wild, tough pair—
even more so than we look!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4500_10:
We never pass up a chance to improve, and we
never stop fighting to win, either!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4600_10: So come scale this peak with us, Grimsley!
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4700_10: All right. Then...I’ll take you on.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4800_10:
Ol’ Grimsley is going to flip a coin. Heads, you
two win and I join your team.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_4900_10: Tails, you lose and we forget about all this talk.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_5100_10:
Oh my. After all that, you’re going to leave it all
to chance?
story_25_01000/2401_1001_5300_10:
Those who give up on themselves can never
claim victory.
story_25_01000/2401_1001_5400_10:
But for those who don’t give up, anything
is possible...
